excerpt: "For pharmaceutical companies and clinical research organizations (CROs), emtelliPro+ unlocks the ability to accrue patients to clinical trials. Using emtelliPro+, researchers can quickly process millions of patients for inclusion and/or exclusion criteria to seat their panel, monitor real world evidence, and evaluate therapeutic efficacy."
